game.description: Retrieve the lost scroll from the depths of the Dragon's Spine.
game.objective: Retrieve a powerful magical scroll hidden within the Dragon's Spine.
game.quest_giver: Gorvoth Ironfist, a renowned dwarven blacksmith and historian.
reward: Magical scroll granting +10% strength for 1 hour

tasks.description: Gather information about the Dragon's Spine and its recent disturbances.
tasks.location: Ironhaven, a dwarven city known for its rich history.
tasks.objective: Speak to Gorvoth Ironfist to learn more about the quest.

tasks.description: Enter the Dragon's Spine through the ancient entrance hidden behind the nearby waterfall.
tasks.location: Waterfall near Ironhaven, leading into the Dragon's Spine mountains.
tasks.objective: Find and enter the entrance to begin exploring the depths of the Dragon's Spine.

tasks.description: Retrieve the magical scroll from within the heart of the Dragon's Spine, navigating treacherous paths and defeating formidable foes.
tasks.location: Heart of the Dragon's Spine, accessible only through overcoming challenges and puzzles.
tasks.objective: Obtain the magical scroll to complete the quest.

game.title: The Lost Scroll of the Ancients
